Date: Thursday, 2/2/1993
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The reactions by the fans to the loss of Bill Swift are terrible!
The overall fan interest decreases a lot!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director

Scouting Director

should demote him before he gets burned.
